revised_title: Observations of Terrestrial Magnetism at Bombay
tldr: The author presents observations of the absolute direction and intensity of terrestrial magnetism at Bombay, using instruments supplied by the Kew Committee of the British Association. The observations were taken from April 1867 to December 1868, and the results show an increase in the dip and provide probable errors for each period. The author suggests a rate of annual change in the dip and discusses possible causes for differences in needle readings.
